original_text: The Levites and all Judah did according to all that Jehoiada the priest commanded, and they each brought his men, who were to go off duty on the Sabbath, with those who were to come on duty on the Sabbath, for Jehoiada the priest did not dismiss the divisions.
korean_text: 레위 사람들과 모든 유다 사람들이 제사장 여호야다가 명령한 모든 것을 준행하여 각기 수하에 안식일에 당번인 자와 안식일에 비번인 자들을 거느리고 있었으니 이는 제사장 여호야다가 비번인 자들을 보내지 아니함이더라

sentences.original_text: The Levites and all Judah did according to all that Jehoiada the priest commanded
sentences.korean_translation: 레위인들과 유다 모든 백성은 제사장 여호야다가 명령한 모든 것대로 행하고

sentences.original_text: and they each brought his men
who were to go off duty on the Sabbath
with those who were to come on duty on the Sabbath
for Jehoiada the priest did not dismiss the divisions
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 제사장 여호야다가 조를 해산하지 않았기 때문이다
